The University of Chittagong ("Chittagong University", CU in short) is a public university in Hathazari Upazila, Chittagong District, Bangladesh. This university has a campus of. It is ranked 2nd among the universities in Bangladesh by Webometrics Ranking of World Universities.
Chittagong University was founded on 3 December 1965 by Fazlul Qadir Chaudhry in Chittagong City. It has around 22,000 students and 750 faculty members.
